# Blindsight (Advanced Talent)
## Overview
*Blindsight (Ex):* A rogue with this talent gains blindsight to a range of 60 feet. A rogue must have blindsense to a range of at least 30 feet and be at least 12th level before selecting this talent.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 9
